data.title: The Facebook Deal That Should Get More Attention
data.text: The Facebook stock performance is mostly about the ad business. But the deal for Kustomer could change things.

data.title: Facebook's Latest Executive Departure Raises Red Flags
data.text: The controversial social network just lost its advertising integrity chief.

data.title: Tesla passes Facebook to become fifth most valuable U.S. company
data.text: The jump makes it the fifth biggest company in the large-cap benchmark when counting the share classes of Alphabet together.
